item.description:
Join the Red Sox Natives and 2 other groups for another Patriots Viewing party!

"The Greatest Bar has kindly reserved the 2nd floor lounge area... enter and go to the 2nd floor. Look for the Meetup signs. Come early at 3:15 to get yourself a prime seat and some pre-game socializing. Game time is 4:15".

Come admire one of the best coached and winningest teams in NFL history-- and the Pats ace quarterback-- as they dismantle their opponent, in this key game to qualify for the playoffs.

There will be the option of a $10.00 beer bucket or $3.00 select beer. Please don't forget to tip your waitstaff...

The Greatest Bar is near the Boston Garden (now renamed the TD [Touch Down?] Garden) on the Green and Orange lines at North Station.If you arrive on time street parking will be available.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party: Pats vs Philadelphia Eagles
